H0.text: The Greek goddess Aphrodite loved which beautiful youth, the son of Myrrha. Attis

H1.text: The Greek goddess Aphrodite loved which beautiful youth, the son of Myrrha. Endymion

H2.text: The Greek goddess Aphrodite loved which beautiful youth, the son of Myrrha. Hyacinth

H3.text: The Greek goddess Aphrodite loved which beautiful youth, the son of Myrrha. ADONIS

A4.text: Adonis was the son of Myrrha.

A5.text: Aphrodite found the baby, and took him to the underworld to be fostered by Persephone.
